value added: 
The customer runs a physiotherapy clinic, where secure communication and efficient data management are critical. Observing their challenges with spam emails and disorganized file handling, I recommended email encryption along with DKIM and DMARC protocol setups to enhance email security. Also, I suggested implementing OneDrive and SharePoint synchronization for streamlined file management and collaboration and these solutions will minimize data breaches, improve workflows, and enable the clinic to focus on delivering exceptional patient care.
